definition: blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra 大般涅槃經|大般涅盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture/to mistake the part for the whole/unable to see the wood for the trees

sentences.english: The blind man is bound to find the grindstone behind him.
sentences.chinese: 盲人一定會發現他身後的磨石。

sentences.english: The blind read braille with their fingers.
This, she says, is the future of reading for the blind.
sentences.chinese: 這種方式，她說，纔是盲人們未來的閱讀方式。

sentences.english: Blind bit of test the waters with a bamboo pole and going very slow.
sentences.chinese: 盲人用竹竿點點探探，走得極緩慢。

sentences.english: A blind man smilingly declined to be helped across the street.
sentences.chinese: 盲人微笑着謝絕別人幫他過馬路。

sentences.english: He who has no aspiration will be like a stray blindman.
sentences.chinese: 人無志向，像迷途的盲人一樣。

sentences.english: Bending down, the blind man stretched out his hand and patted the dog's head.
sentences.chinese: 彎下來，這位盲人伸出他的手並拍了拍這條狗的頭。

sentences.english: Blind sidewalk is an important component for the blind people to go out in their daily life.
sentences.chinese: 盲道是輔助盲人日常生活中出行的城建設施之一。

sentences.english: She recorded audio tapes of books for blind people.
sentences.chinese: 她爲盲人把書的內容錄成錄音磁帶。

sentences.english: Helen Keller became blind and deaf. She couldn't see and she couldn't hear.
sentences.chinese: 海倫凱勒成爲盲人和聾子，他不能看也不能聽。

sentences.english: Each sees a different part, like the blind men patting an elephant.
sentences.chinese: 就像盲人摸象，每個人都只看了不同的一部分。

sentences.english: Among the blind, the one-eyes man is king.
The blind have a keen touch.
Sail Blind teams have competed throughout the world in regattas.
sentences.chinese: 各盲人帆船賽隊在世界各國的帆船賽事大展風采。

sentences.english: The blind can also see a picture in a dream.
sentences.chinese: 盲人在夢中也可以看到圖像。

sentences.english: The mugger laid to a blind man.
sentences.chinese: 搶劫犯突然向一個盲人襲擊。

definition: disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
guide dog (for the blind)/Seeing Eye dog
to lose one's eyesight/to become blind/blindness
